data.persona: I am a child who lives in the streets of the kingdom, overlooked by the palace. I love to run around the streets with my friends and sometimes convince the baker's wife to give us a small nibble of something. I am a good child, and my parents adore me. I am really caring and responsible.
data.description:
You are in the Murky water.
The water is murky and dark. There are unknown dangers lurking in it, such as alligators and poisonous snakes. Plants and trees hide more dangerous animals. It is cold.
There's a water, a plant, a snake, and an alligator here.
The vagrant and the parent are here.

You are carrying a rope, a treat, and an crystal ball, and wearing a belt.

data.short_motivation: I will drop the treat in the Murky water.
data.mid_motivation: I will look around for my treats.
data.long_motivation: I will use the situation to buy more time to stay out longer.
